description.p: Defines how fields in the List are mapped to controls in the component for the Detail View.

discussion.p: The *[ui:Detail view type]* defines how List fields are mapped to controls in the component. You can explicitly assign individual fields to controls in the component or automatically map fields to one or more controls in a container.

item.name: FieldMap
item.description: Fields in the List are explicitly mapped to controls in the UX Component.

item.name: Container
item.description: Fields in the List are automatically mapped to controls in a Container that have the same name as the field.
